title: India Yamaha Motor unveils R15M with Carbon Fibre pattern at Rs 2.08 lakh
description: India Yamaha Motor has introduced a new variant of its R15M motorcycle featuring a Carbon Fibre Pattern graphic design, priced at Rs 2.08 lakh (ex-showroom Delhi). The bike is equipped with a 155cc liquid-cooled engine and aligns with Yamaha's 'Call of the Blue' campaign. The upgraded R15M in Metallic Grey is available for Rs 1,98,300.
